ygData.subject: Re: will weapon skill increase if using against weak monster?
ygData.msgSnippet: Well its time to pertend your a new be and go smack some spiderlings for a few hours!! ... From: Dennis Chan  To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com
ygData.messageBody:
Well its time to pertend your a new be and go smack some spiderlings for a
few hours!!
-----Original Message-----
From: Dennis Chan <dchan17@...>
To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com <EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com>
Date: Tuesday, May 04, 1999 2:33 AM
Subject: [EQ_Necromancer] will weapon skill increase if using against weak
monster?


>From: "Dennis Chan" <dchan17@...>
>
>Ok i am level 14 now and i have been using 1h weapons for the sake of
>shield. But recently i found out that necro can't wield a shield(doh!) so i
>decide to switch to 2h blunt weapon. It's kinda dangerous now for me to
>melee monster that con black to me cuz they usually hit 30 dam per hit and
i
>don't get to practice my 2h blunt much.
>
>my quetsion is does 2h blunt skill increase if u melee low level creatures?
>
>
